byline.original: By EUGEN KOVACS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: panic reptd in Galati after Rumanian guards fire on Gagautzi laborers awaiting return to Bessarabia; refugees from Bessarabia continue to arrive, Bucharest; frontier closed, Galati
snippet: BUCHAREST, Rumania, July 2-- Calm has been restored in the border port of Galati after a period of confusion in which many civilians were killed....

headline.main: 300 DOCK WORKERS KILLED AT GALATI; Wild Panic Followed Attack by Rumanian Soldiers on Unruly Civilian Group QUIET IS NOW RESTORED Outbreak Apparently Caused by Nervousness--Flight of Refugees Continues

lead_paragraph: BUCHAREST, Rumania, July 2-- Calm has been restored in the border port of Galati after a period of confusion in which many civilians were killed.
